constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 每行和每列的元素和必须等于 3

constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 每行和每列中非零元素的数量不超过 2

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 每个单元格的值只能是 0, 1, 2 或 3

constraints.name: count_constraint
constraints.description: 矩阵中值为 3 的单元格数量至少为 X
